about_the_game:
What is Hero’s Warband?

Is an immersive 2D Survival Autobattler that puts you in command of a legendary warband. In this strategic adventure, recruit and manage a diverse array of heroes, each with unique classes and skills.



Upgrades!

Elevate them from Novice heroes to the Divine heroes the pinnacle of power.



Astoria

Venture forth and conquer the vibrant world of Astoria


Intense Battles!

Engage in thrilling battles against relentless waves of enemies, unleashing the full potential of your warband. Customize your heroes by equipping them with incredible items, and making them learn unique spells shaping them into formidable forces on the battlefield.




Tons of Unique heroes



As the commander, optimize your warband's composition through experimentation, discovering the perfect synergy between classes to suit your strategic vision. Are you ready to lead your heroes to greatness? Join Hero’s Warband and embark on a journey of tactical brilliance, survival, and epic battles!


Features
  • Auto Battle! Sit back and witness your heroes clash with enemies in a mesmerizing display of strength and strategy. Watch their progression unfold before your eyes, as they grow stronger and evolve into formidable champions. Immerse yourself in the thrill of the battle
  • Recruit and upgrade heroes! Find the best composition of heroes for your warband, tailoring each recruitment and upgrade to match your distinct playstyle.
  • Unique Hero Classes and skills.
  • Loot and items: Equip your heroes with gear dropped by slaying monsters or purchased from the shop. With over 100 unique items, each scales from novice to divine.
  • Engage in wave-based gameplay as you battle and endure relentless hordes of enemies with each successive wave.
  • Bosses and Enemy Heroes. Confront powerful bosses and formidable enemy heroes to test the strength of your warband. These adversaries are not only stronger than regular foes but also possess unique skills to challenge your tactical prowess.
  • RogueLite mechanics. Increase your bonus stats as the commander of the warband and change or buy unique combinations of heroes for your future run
